LABEL: 0x3DD
STRING: A nightmare where Psico left me.

LABEL: 0x42A
STRING: She was burning, scarlet and crimson.

LABEL: 0x477
STRING: It felt too real to dismiss as just a dream.

LABEL: 0x4F0
STRING: It's just a dream, that's all.

LABEL: 0x52F
STRING: There's no way that could happen.

LABEL: 0x5A4
STRING: Psico is here, sleeping beside me right now.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: Psico and I are going to be together forever.

LABEL: 0x65A
STRING: I plan to live with her after I graduate.

LABEL: 0x6B1
STRING: And if she still can't leave this place, I'll just live here then.

LABEL: 0x718
STRING: Yes, let's make a ring out of clover leaves.

LABEL: 0x769
STRING: A ring to symbolize the eternal vow between me and Psico.

LABEL: 0x7B2
STRING: I won't leave her no matter what.

LABEL: 0x817
STRING: If I can paint a future like this, I'm sure this anxiety of mine will disappear.

LABEL: 0x8A8
STRING: My anxiety won't go away at all.

LABEL: 0x8D0
STRING: I haven't felt this kind of anxiety ever since I met Psico.

LABEL: 0x92B
STRING: Even though Psico is sleeping beside me.

LABEL: 0x972
STRING: Why? I don't want it. It's scary.

LABEL: 0x9FE
STRING: Those words echo over and over, filling up my head, binding me.

LABEL: 0xADB
STRING: My breathing is ragged, getting faster and faster.

LABEL: 0xB9A
STRING: I can even hear the sound of my blood pulsating.

LABEL: 0xC40
STRING: I can't even get a good view of the flower garden that's all around us.

LABEL: 0xC9C
STRING: I'm fading in and out of consciousness.

LABEL: 0xD8C
STRING: I hear a voice in the background. I can't tell if it's near or far.

LIST.STRING: I know that voice, it's my favourite voice.

LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: All I can hear is my own heartbeat and breathing.

LABEL: 0x105F
STRING: That noise increases my anxiety even more.

LABEL: 0x10B6
STRING: It was already beyond what I could bear.

LABEL: 0x1109
STRING: Right now, a world that I don't understand is spread before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: A world where the scenery is shifting every second.

LABEL: 0x133A
STRING: ─The moonlight was shining on this dreamscape.

LABEL: 0x13A1
STRING: I don't know why, but it's slowly turning white.

LABEL: 0x13F6
STRING: Is this the continuation of the dream I had earlier?

LABEL: 0x143F
STRING: If so, what happened to Psico?

LABEL: 0x147E
STRING: I looked around, but there was no one. Nothing.

LABEL: 0x14D3
STRING: My vision is slowly going white.

LABEL: 0x155B
STRING: As if to fill up the whole world that I can see.

LABEL: 0x15B2
STRING: I wonder when I will wake up from this dream.

LABEL: 0x1638
STRING: I want to hear her voice.

LABEL: 0x16AA
STRING: When, and how do I get out of this place?

LABEL: 0x1703
STRING: ─Maybe it's going to stay that way forever?

LABEL: 0x1760
STRING: Such a horrible thought fills my heart with dread.

LABEL: 0x180F
STRING: At that moment, my vision, which had been white, suddenly turned black.

LABEL: 0x1868
STRING: In the darkness, I couldn't tell up from down, left from right, front from back.

LABEL: 0x18C7
STRING: I don't know if I'm standing or sitting. I don't know anything.

LABEL: 0x195B
STRING: I got the urge to hold my knees.

LABEL: 0x1AB0
STRING: At some point, I melted into the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1D9C
STRING: I can't stop shivering, my eyes are wide open and my head is in my hands.

LABEL: 0x1DF3
STRING: Tears, snot, and drool drip down my face. All I can do is breathe.

LABEL: 0x1E4F
STRING: It's too fast, but I can't stop it.

LABEL: 0x1F5F
STRING: ─Suddenly, I felt a soft touch, and warmth spread out from it.

LABEL: 0x1FB7
STRING: It was a very soothing warmth.

LABEL: 0x1FE2
STRING: It was my favourite warmth and scent.

LABEL: 0x204F
STRING: My heartbeat slowed down, little by little.

LABEL: 0x20EC
STRING: Before I knew it, the usual vibrant garden had returned to my vision.

LABEL: 0x22F9
STRING: Psico was looking into my face with a worried expression.

LABEL: 0x2354
STRING: Ah, I've made you nervous for my sake.

LABEL: 0x251E
STRING: But I don't have the time to keep up appearances. My voice doesn't even come out right now.

LABEL: 0x26CB
STRING: Psico gently strokes my back as she hugs me.

LABEL: 0x27E1
STRING: My heart calms down in response to her loving voice.

LABEL: 0x2846
STRING: Slowly, I turn my gaze towards Psico.

LABEL: 0x2897
STRING: Psico was looking at me, accepting me as I am, even though I must be unsightly right now.

LABEL: 0x2A28
STRING: While saying that, she does her best to support me with her small body.

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: I couldn't help but love her. I don't want to be apart from her. I hoped that time would stop at this moment.

LABEL: 0x2B0E
STRING: I'm going to skip school today.

LABEL: 0x2B51
STRING: Right now I want to feel this warmth. I want to be embraced. I want to feel the sensation of this sweet girl who accepts me as I am.

LABEL: 0x2C25
STRING: It didn't matter to me that the ruins that I saw in my dream were overlapping with my field of vision.

LABEL: 0x2F1C
STRING: I don't usually come to the library at all, but it's a great help in times like these.

LABEL: 0x2F83
STRING: I don't know when was the last time I came here. Maybe it was in elementary school when I borrowed some books for a research project.

LABEL: 0x3006
STRING: Now it's after school, and I'm in the local library.

LABEL: 0x3055
STRING: Metarou didn't come to school today.

LABEL: 0x30A6
STRING: It must have something to do with what I saw yesterday. I can't get it out of my mind.

LABEL: 0x310B
STRING: ...I wonder what this sense of unease is.

LABEL: 0x3156
STRING: But there's this feeling of "something" that's stuck in my chest.

LABEL: 0x31A7
STRING: I have to find out if my fears are unfounded or true.

LABEL: 0x3200
STRING: I have a hunch it's related to that abandoned building. There's been a fire there before, under suspicious circumstances.

LABEL: 0x326F
STRING: It was when we were still in elementary school.

LABEL: 0x32C2
STRING: I remember that we had come and leave school in groups because it was dangerous.

LABEL: 0x331D
STRING: That place was already abandoned as far as I can remember, so there was no way it could have caught on fire by itself.

LABEL: 0x33A4
STRING: When I was younger, I wasn't particularly interested in the case, but now I feel I should have paid more attention.

LABEL: 0x3429
STRING: I need a clue, something, anything.

LABEL: 0x347C
STRING: It's impossible for one person to gather enough information, so I brought Yukimaru along to help.

LABEL: 0x34F9
STRING: I haven't been able to tell him why I'm doing this yet. If it's just an unfounded fear, then I'll keep it to myself.

LABEL: 0x3576
STRING: If it's true, I don't want to have to suspect Metarou.

LABEL: 0x3684
STRING: "Hey, Nana. Why here all of a sudden..."

LABEL: 0x3838
STRING: "Enough already. Just go through every article on fires that occurred when we were in elementary school."

LABEL: 0x39D7
STRING: "Sheesh, you're a real slavedriver, you know that?"

LABEL: 0x3AB3
STRING: I wish you'd be a little more motivated. You should be able to tell just by looking at me that I'm in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x3B2A
STRING: The library was getting close to closing time.

LABEL: 0x3BB2
STRING: A fire that broke out in an abandoned building, a suspicious fire of unknown origin.

LABEL: 0x3C1B
STRING: I hope my fears are groundless... I really hope so.

LABEL: 0x3C6A
STRING: Thinking idly, I scanned over the titles.

LABEL: 0x3CC1
STRING: Thump, my heart jumped in my chest.

LABEL: 0x3D4B
STRING: That headline caught my eye. I didn't know why, but I found myself drawn to it.

LABEL: 0x3DB0
STRING: It seemed unrelated, but it was on the same page of the same newspaper as the fire, which means the timing is as close as you can get.

LABEL: 0x3E3B
STRING: I couldn't help but read through the article.

LABEL: 0x3E86
STRING: One day, an elementary school girl disappeared without a trace.

LABEL: 0x3EE7
STRING: There was no mention of any possible reason. Only that the investigation was ongoing.

LABEL: 0x3F60
STRING: No, no, that's not what I was looking for. I was in such a hurry that I just skimmed through it.

LABEL: 0x3FD3
STRING: What I'm curious about is where this incident took place.

LABEL: 0x409C
STRING: Even Yukimaru seemed to understand something was up when he saw me like this.

LABEL: 0x41B5
STRING: "This brings back memories. Didn't this fire occur when we were in elementary school? I wonder what caused it?"

LABEL: 0x4374
STRING: "...In the end, it seems no one knows. But more importantly..."

LABEL: 0x4513
STRING: "...Hey, Yukimaru. Yesterday, I tailed Metarou, while staying hidden."

LABEL: 0x4845
STRING: "Metarou was on his way to this abandoned building. He was talking to someone... or something, and then─"

LABEL: 0x4967
STRING: I told him everything that happened yesterday, everything that I saw.

LABEL: 0x49D8
STRING: What happened in the ruins, what Metarou was doing.

LABEL: 0x4A2D
STRING: How I talked to Metarou's mother, and how he hadn't been home.

LABEL: 0x4A98
STRING: Of the fire incident and this article regarding a missing girl that we just found.

LABEL: 0x4AF1
STRING: ...A lot of information is starting to come together in a way that gives me a bad feeling.

LABEL: 0x4B58
STRING: Things that seemed to be unrelated are now being pieced together.

LABEL: 0x4BBD
STRING: But maybe there's another possibility, too.

LABEL: 0x4D03
STRING: "Yukimaru, I want to have a proper talk with Metarou."

LABEL: 0x5001
STRING: "I feel like we need to have a talk."

LABEL: 0x5262
STRING: My heartbeat quickened as I got a sense of dread.

LABEL: 0x52B3
STRING: I had become convinced of my suspicions.

LABEL: 0x55A2
STRING: Is this a dream, or reality?

LABEL: 0x575B
STRING: I hear a sweet voice calling me.

LABEL: 0x5925
STRING: Yeah, I feel really safe and relaxed in here.

LABEL: 0x597C
STRING: This is the only place where I can truly be myself.

LABEL: 0x5A85
STRING: "Heehee. Well, if Metarou says so, I'm happy too."

LABEL: 0x5DAB
STRING: "Can I just ask you one question?"

LABEL: 0x5E80
STRING: Of course. I've no reason to refuse.

LABEL: 0x5F7D
STRING: "Well then, let me ask you this..."

LABEL: 0x6220
STRING: I hadn't really thought about that before.

LABEL: 0x6264
STRING: When I met Psico, I changed.

LABEL: 0x62C1
STRING: Rather, I became able to express my true self.

LABEL: 0x630A
STRING: Psico was the first person who accepted my "weakness" as a human being.

LABEL: 0x6644
STRING: When I met you that day, You gave me the "real me".

LABEL: 0x690E
STRING: "Phew, ahaha. For some reason I'm laughing with joy."

LABEL: 0x70BB
STRING: "So... Hey? Let's make a vow, shall we?"

LABEL: 0x727D
STRING: "Metarou and I will be together forever."

LABEL: 0x75A9
STRING: "I'll only give my love to Metarou."

LABEL: 0x7740
STRING: "I'll only look at you. I won't look at anything but you."

LABEL: 0x7A52
STRING: "Don't look at anyone but me, Metarou, okay?"

LABEL: 0x7FD8
STRING: "In the language of flowers, clover means 'promise.'"

LABEL: 0x8055
STRING: "This clover is a sign of our promise."

LABEL: 0x8488
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0x84C9
STRING: Illuminated by twinkling stars was a girl, talking with another girl.

LABEL: 0x854A
STRING: "I can't go anywhere, I can't be anything."

LABEL: 0x85C1
STRING: "Sometimes I wish I could just get out of here."

LABEL: 0x8646
STRING: "It wasn't him who kept me stuck in here, it was myself..."

LABEL: 0x86DB
STRING: "I've chosen to be like this. But when I think I don't want this anymore... After I've given it up, I want it again. I'm so selfish."

LABEL: 0x8815
STRING: "If you found out that this isn't what you wanted... you would let it go, wouldn't you? At least, that's what I think."

LABEL: 0x88D4
STRING: "...No, you're just trying to make excuses because you can't make the right decision for yourself."

LABEL: 0x897B
STRING: "To get to the point... you have a lot of regrets."

LABEL: 0x89FA
STRING: "'...When will peace of mind ever come?'"

LABEL: 0x8A7F
STRING: "'...When will I ever get a good night's sleep?'"

LABEL: 0x8B0C
STRING: "'...I wonder how many more days I have to get through before I can truly laugh....'"

LABEL: 0x8BA5
STRING: "That's what you've been asking yourself for so long that it feels like you've lost your mind... Isn't it, Psico?"

LABEL: 0x8CC5
STRING: "I don't blame you, in fact I know exactly how you feel."

LABEL: 0x8F0E
STRING: "All my life, every day I wished that I could just disappear.

LABEL: 0x8F8F
STRING: "Because no one needs me. Because this life has no value, no meaning."

LABEL: 0x910A
STRING: "I thought, 'At this rate, nothing good is going to happen to me.'"

LABEL: 0x935D
STRING: "Mihomi's very, veeery, important person. ...Mihomi's most favourite person in the world."

LABEL: 0x93FE
STRING: "Mihomi wants to live with them because she's needed."

LABEL: 0x9499
STRING: "Because that person sought me out, needed me."

LABEL: 0x9528
STRING: "It doesn't matter how dark of a life you've lived, in those final moments you feel you've been rewarded."

LABEL: 0x9724
STRING: "I'm sure there's already someone out there who needs you, Psico-chan."

LABEL: 0x97BB
STRING: "...I don't need you to tell me that, I know that already."

LABEL: 0x9840
STRING: "But... but─ I can't go back, can I? I've gone too far to come back."

LABEL: 0x98ED
STRING: "At this point, there's no going back now."

LABEL: 0x9A44
STRING: "It doesn't matter. It's never too late or too early to turn around, there's always time."

LABEL: 0x9CF4
STRING: "You can do it. It'll be alright, you can do it for sure, Psico-chan."

LABEL: 0x9E65
STRING: "If you do that, then Psico-chan, surely─"

LABEL: 0x9EE0
STRING: "You will be able to obtain the heart of the person you love."
